product_name: Princeton Tec Pulsar II LED Light
long_description: Fun, new colors! A two-way switch allows this tiny light to be used as a pinch light for intermittent use, or flick the switch for continuous burn. Nearly indestructible LED bulb casts an even light. Powered by two tiny lithium cells (included) for up to 14 hours of light. Durable, water-resistant construction--perfect for use in wet conditions. Hook it on your backpack or keychain with the attached split ring to keep it handy.
short_description: Fun, new colors! A two-way switch allows this tiny light to be used as a pinch light for intermittent use, or flick the switch for continuous burn.
